thread.title: Mrs MARGARET BONE
thread.title_full: Cruise Sale Finder reviewed by Mrs MARGARET BONE

author: Mrs MARGARET BONE
title: Mrs MARGARET BONE
text: I had already booked & paid a deposit with a T/A , but I decided to see if we could get a better deal ....Guess what we sure did with Cruise Finder , we saved $600 - $100 deposit I had already paid to T/A & I was still $500 better off .
